thread.title: 15 Best 128GB RAM For 2023 | Robots.net

author: Cindee Newell
title: 15 Best 128GB RAM For 2023 | Robots.net
text: Are you on the hunt for the best 128GB RAM for 2023? Look no further! In this article, we have rounded up the 15 top choices that are sure to elevate your computer's performance to new heights. Whether you are a professional gamer, a video editor, or a hardcore multitasker, having ample RAM is crucial for a smooth and seamless computing experience. With a whopping 128GB of RAM, these options offer lightning-fast speeds, incredible multitasking capabilities, and enhanced overall efficiency. Get ready to take your computer's performance to the next level with our comprehensive guide to the 15 best 128GB RAM for 2023. Overall Score: 9/10 The Corsair VENGEANCE RGB PRO 128GB DDR4 memory is a high-performance desktop memory that offers vivid, animated lighting with its ten ultra-bright, individually addressable RGB LEDs per module. It can be easily customized and controlled using the CORSAIR iCUE software, allowing you to synchronize lighting across all your compatible products. This memory is compatible with both Intel and AMD DDR4 motherboards and requires no extra wires or cables for installation. It also features a custom performance PCB for optimal signal quality, carefully screened ICs for extended overclocking potential, and an aluminum heat spreader for excellent memory cooling. With Intel XMP 2.0 support and a limited lifetime warranty, the Corsair VENGEANCE RGB PRO 128GB DDR4 memory provides a reliable and visually stunning solution for your desktop needs. Key Features - High performance DDR4 memory with vivid RGB lighting - CORSAIR i CUE software for customization and synchronization - Compatible with Intel and AMD DDR4 motherboards - Easy installation with no extra wires or cables - Custom performance PCB and screened ICs for overclocking potential - Aluminum heat spreader for superior memory cooling - Supports Intel XMP 2.0 for simple one-setting installation - Limited lifetime warranty for peace of mind Specifications - Color: Black - Dimension: 5.44Lx0.30Wx2.00H - Size: 128GB (4x32GB) Pros - Individual temperature warning sensors per stick - Excellent for multi-monitor video editing - Perfect for RAM-intensive tasks like video editing and composing - Reliable and compatible with various motherboards - Fast delivery and easy installation Cons - Forced to pay for RGB if not desired - Some users experienced defective units - Latency on these sticks is a bit high The Corsair VENGEANCE RGB PRO 128GB DDR4 memory is an impressive solution for those in need of high-performance and visually appealing desktop memory. With its individually addressable RGB LEDs and customizable lighting profiles, this memory adds a vibrant touch to any system. It offers excellent compatibility with both Intel and AMD DDR4 motherboards, and the included CORSAIR iCUE software allows for easy synchronization with other compatible products. Along with its reliable performance, the memory features temperature warning sensors, extended overclocking potential, and a limited lifetime warranty for peace of mind. While the RGB lighting may not appeal to everyone, the Corsair VENGEANCE RGB PRO 128GB DDR4 memory is a solid choice for those seeking a powerful and visually striking memory upgrade. Overall Score: 9/10 Upgrade your gaming computer with the Corsair Vengeance LPX memory module. This high-performance DDR4 memory ensures quick response times and smooth gameplay. With a low-profile height and solid aluminum heatspreader, it fits perfectly in most small-form-factor builds while efficiently dissipating heat. The memory chips are hand-sorted for optimal overclocking performance and are compatible with the latest Intel and AMD DDR4 motherboards. The Corsair Vengeance LPX also supports Intel XMP 2.0 for easy installation and setup. This 128GB (4x32GB) DDR4 2666 memory kit comes in a sleek black color and is a great choice for gamers looking to boost their system's performance. Key Features - Hand-sorted memory chips ensure high performance - Optimized for wide compatibility with Intel and AMD motherboards - Low-profile height fits in most small-form-factor builds - Solid aluminum heatspreader dissipates heat efficiently - Supports Intel XMP 2.0 for easy installation - Available in multiple colors to match your system's style Specifications - Color: Black - Dimension: 5.31Lx0.28Wx1.32H - Size: 4 x 32 GB Pros - High-performance memory for quick response times - Efficiently dissipates heat for consistent high clock speeds - Easy installation with Intel XMP 2.0 support - Compatible with the latest Intel and AMD motherboards - Low-profile design fits in small-form-factor builds Cons The Corsair Vengeance LPX 128GB DDR4 memory kit is a top-notch choice for gamers who want to enhance their system’s performance. With its hand-sorted memory chips, low-profile design, and efficient heat dissipation, this memory kit provides optimal overclocking capabilities and ensures smooth gameplay. The compatibility with Intel and AMD motherboards, along with the easy installation using Intel XMP 2.0, makes it a hassle-free upgrade option. Whether you’re a serious gamer or a multitasker, the Corsair Vengeance LPX delivers the speed and reliability you need. Upgrade your gaming battles with this powerful memory kit. Overall Score: 8.5/10 The G.SKILL Ripjaws V Series [DDR4 RAM](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-a-ddr4-ram/) is a high-performance memory kit specifically designed for gaming. It features a 128GB kit containing 4 x 32GB modules, with a speed of DDR4-2666 and CAS Latency CL18 (18-18-18-38) at 1.20V. This RAM is ideal for gamers and users dealing with [big data](https://robots.net/fintech/how-big-is-big-data/), offering reliability, durability, and performance. It supports XMP profile to reach overclock speed and is compatible with various motherboards. However, it is important not to mix memory kits to avoid stability issues or system failure. With positive reviews praising its compatibility and performance, this G.SKILL RAM is a great choice for high-performance gaming and computing needs. Key Features - Designed for AMD and Intel platforms - 128GB kit with 4 x 32GB modules - DDR4-2666 speed with CL18 latency at 1.20V - XMP profile support for overclocking - Compatible with validated motherboards Specifications - Color: Black - Size: 128GB Pros - Great compatibility with AMD and Intel platforms - Reliable and durable performance - Good value for the price Cons - Possible stability issues when mixing memory kits - Some reports of defective sticks and lack of tech support The G.SKILL Ripjaws V Series DDR4 RAM provides excellent performance, reliability, and compatibility for gaming and high-performance computing. With a 128GB kit and support for overclocking, it offers the necessary power for handling demanding tasks and big data. Users have praised its compatibility with both AMD and Intel platforms, making it a versatile choice. However, there have been reports of stability issues when mixing memory kits, and some users have experienced defective sticks without proper tech support. Overall, if you’re looking for a high-performance RAM kit at a reasonable price, the G.SKILL Ripjaws V Series is a solid option. Overall Score: 9/10 Experience extreme power and exceptional performance with the HP Envy [Desktop PC](https://robots.net/tech-reviews/11-best-desktop-pc-for-2023/). This Intel Core i9-13900K processor with turbo boost up to 5.80GHz provides an unparalleled computing experience. With a massive 10 TB [SSD](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-a-ssd/) drive and a whopping 128 GB of [DDR5 RAM](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-the-best-ddr5-ram/), this desktop offers ultra-performance and pure SSD storage. The NVIDIA GeForce [RTX graphics card](https://robots.net/tech/10-amazing-rtx-graphics-card-for-2023/) with 12 GB GDDR6 dedicated memory and up to 14 GB total video RAM ensures stunning visuals and smooth gameplay. With Win 11 Pro, WiFi 6E AX211, [Bluetooth 5](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-bluetooth-5/).3, and a variety of USB ports, this desktop is perfect for both business and gaming purposes. The sleek design in natural silver adds a touch of elegance to your workspace. Key Features - Intel Core i9-13900K processor with turbo boost up to 5.80GHz - 128 GB of DDR5 RAM - 10 TB SSD drive - NVIDIA Ge Force RTX with 12 GB GDDR6 dedicated memory - Win 11 Pro, Wi Fi 6E AX211, [Bluetooth](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-bluetooth/)5.3 - Multiple USB ports, audio jack, and headphone/mic combo Specifications - Color: Natural silver - Dimension: 16.00Lx7.00Wx17.50H Pros - Extreme power for high-performance computing - Massive 10 TB SSD storage for ample space - Large 128 GB RAM ensures smooth multitasking [Powerful graphics card](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-the-most-powerful-graphics-card/)for stunning visuals - Versatile connectivity options Cons The HP Envy Desktop PC is a beast when it comes to performance. With its powerful processor, ample RAM, and massive SSD storage, it can handle any task with ease. Whether you’re a professional who needs the power for demanding work or a gamer looking for top-notch performance, this desktop has you covered. The NVIDIA GeForce RTX [graphics card](https://robots.net/tech/which-is-the-best-graphics-card/) ensures impressive visuals and the variety of connectivity options makes it suitable for any setup. The sleek design adds a touch of sophistication to your workspace. Overall, the HP Envy Desktop PC is a high-performing machine that delivers on both power and style. Overall Score: 8/10 The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 is a powerful and efficient 16-inch FHD [Mobile Workstation](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-a-mobile-workstation/) Business Laptop Computer. It is equipped with the 12th Gen Intel Core i5-12600HX processor, delivering exceptional performance. The laptop features a 16-inch FHD LED UWVA Anti-Glare display, ensuring a clear and vibrant visual experience. With the NVIDIA RTX A2000 8GB graphics, it provides powerful graphics processing capabilities, suitable for demanding tasks. The laptop also comes with 128GB DDR5 RAM and an 8TB [PCIe SSD](https://robots.net/tech/8-best-pcie-ssd-for-2023/), offering ample storage space for all your files and applications. Other notable features include the Intel Wi-Fi 6E AX211, [Windows 11](https://robots.net/tech-reviews/pc-tech-reviews/windows-11-is-here-everything-you-need-to-know/) Pro, and a backlit spill-resistant keyboard. Overall, the HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 is a reliable and high-performing laptop for business use. Key Features - – [CPU](https://robots.net/tech/where-is-cpu/): 12th Gen Intel Core i5-12600HX, 12C (4P + 8E) / 16T, P-core 2.5 / 4.6GHz, E-core 1.8 / 3.3GHz, 18MB. - -Display: 16" diagonal FHD LED UWVA Anti-Glare for [IR Webcam](https://robots.net/tech-reviews/12-best-ir-webcam-for-2023/)(1920×1080)(250 Nits) Display; Graphics: NVIDIA RTX A2000 8GB GDDR6. - -128GB DDR5 Memory; 8TB (4TB PCIe NVMe [M.2 SSD](https://robots.net/tech/9-best-m-2-ssd-for-2023/)+ 4TB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD); No Optical drive - -Intel Wi-Fi 6E AX211 (2×2) and Bluetooth 5.3 wireless card (supporting gigabit data rate). - -Left side: 1 power connector; 1 Mini Display Port 1.4; 2 Thunderbolt 4 with USB4 Type-C 40Gbps signaling rate; 1 [HDMI](https://robots.net/tech/what-is-hdmi-for/)2.1; - -Right side: 1 RJ-45; 1 headphone/microphone combo; 1 Super Speed USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate (charging); - -1 Super Speed USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate. - -Bundled with BROAG Mouse Pad. Windows 11 Professional, 64-bit, English; - -HP Touchpad Backlit spill-resistant numeric Premium Keyboard. Specifications - Dimension: 14.29Lx9.86Wx1.12H - Size: 128GB DDR5 RAM, 8TB PCIe SSD Pros Cons The HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 is a top-of-the-line [mobile workstation laptop](https://robots.net/tech/6-amazing-mobile-workstation-laptop-for-2023/) that offers exceptional performance and a range of impressive features. With its 12th Gen Intel Core i5 processor, powerful NVIDIA RTX A2000 graphics, and ample storage space, it is well-equipped to handle demanding business tasks. The 16-inch FHD display delivers a clear and vibrant visual experience, and the backlit spill-resistant keyboard adds convenience. The laptop also includes Windows 11 Pro and a bundled mouse pad for added value. While the laptop doesn’t have any specific pros or cons mentioned in the reviews, its overall customer rating of 5.0/5 indicates high user satisfaction. If you’re in need of a reliable and powerful mobile [workstation](https://robots.net/tech/7-amazing-workstation-for-2023/) for your business, the HP ZBook Fury 16 G9 is definitely worth considering. Overall Score: 8/10 Upgrade your laptop's performance with the A-Tech 128GB DDR4 [Laptop RAM](https://robots.net/tech/how-much-ram-should-my-laptop-have/) Memory Modules. These memory modules are compatible with select laptop computers and offer an easy installation process. Maximize your system's performance, boost loading speeds, and multitask with ease. Backed by A-Tech's Lifetime Warranty, you can rely on their friendly tech support team for assistance. The 128GB RAM Kit consists of 4 x 32GB modules with speeds up to 3200MHz. It is NON-ECC Unbuffered, dual rank, and follows JEDEC DDR4 standard 1.2V. With a customer rating of 4.7/5, this RAM kit has received positive reviews for its performance and the company's excellent customer service. With easy installation, high performance, and a large capacity, these modules provide an excellent boost to your system’s speed and multitasking capabilities. The lifetime warranty and customer support from A-Tech further add to the appeal of this product. Whether you’re a power user or someone needing more memory for demanding tasks, these RAM modules are a reliable choice. Considering their positive customer reviews and the company’s commitment to excellent service, the A-Tech 128GB DDR4 Laptop RAM Memory Modules deserve a score of 8 out of 10. Overall Score: 9.5/10 Upgrade your laptop or notebook computer's memory with the A-Tech 128GB DDR4 RAM kit. This RAM kit includes four 32GB modules for a total of 128GB memory. It features DDR4 SO-DIMM 260-Pin technology with speeds up to 2666/2667-MHz. With non-ECC unbuffered and 2Rx8 (dual rank x8) design, this RAM improves your system's performance and allows for smoother multitasking. Quick and easy to install, this RAM requires no expertise. It undergoes stringent quality control testing and is backed by A-Tech's limited lifetime warranty. Expand your system's memory and enjoy faster performance with this reliable RAM upgrade. With its large memory capacity and fast speeds, this RAM kit improves system performance and allows for smoother multitasking. It is quick and easy to install, making it accessible for users of all expertise levels. Additionally, the RAM modules undergo stringent quality control testing and are backed by A-Tech’s limited lifetime warranty, ensuring their reliability and durability. While the price may be a bit higher compared to other options, the performance and peace of mind offered by this RAM kit make it worth the investment. Overall, the A-Tech 128GB DDR4 RAM kit is a great choice for anyone looking to enhance their computer’s performance.
